content: an introduction to the magical world of lilliana the 2017 lilliana cal is available for free in all 11 downloadable parts or you can grab it in a handy pack in the compendium lilliana compendium 1 released in december 2017 contains the complete lilliana including round for round instructions on unreleased colourways and the unreleased alternative start 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/lilliana-compendium lilliana is written to make a 145cm x 145cm blanket it uses us terminology and is worked in rounds skill level - intermediate **material list ** dk yarn of your choice - i used colourspun dk cotton 4mm hook scissors needles for sewing in ends stitch markers 4 beads - i would recommend using plastic for easy washing these are optional for the tassels in the prelude beginning pages of the pattern you will find detailed stitch tutorials yarn quantities used for two of the colourways and many many more bits of useful info you are more than welcome to work the blanket in any yarn of your choice however depending on the yarn and gauge you may have a size difference throughout the written pattern there are detailed photo tutorials visit our facebook group for pattern support and other info https //www facebook com/groups/1370975902929963/ yarn kits can be purchased via the hooked on sunshine site www hookedonsunshine co
